actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations for a 5-year period, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends authorizations for the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 for five years (to June 30, 1979). Extends the redevelopment area designations for the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to June 1, 1976, unless the qualified governing body of the country requests de-designation action before such date.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations for a 5-year period, and for other purposes.
